Reviews.Content: Demolished finally - well deserved goodbye! Don't worry - this place was finally closed and demolished. But I remember the dirty carpets (you could grow potatoes in them,) the roaches and the dirt, when I arrived after a delayed flight. Uncaring staff, unkempt premises, poor excuse of a restaurant - this place could have qualified for the Yours is a Very Bad Hotel PowerPoint sequel.
Reviews.Author: jose.k

Reviews.Content: Just okay; not up to the Doubletree name I am a Hilton Honors member and stayed at this hotel in August while visiting the Miami area. I chose it thru *** and thought I'd scored a major deal. While the hotel is okay, clean and so forth, it certainly is NOT up to the Doubletree standard. No pizzazz at all, almost a tired tawdry pool (but clean) and sub-par mattress/comfort. I wasn't taken but I didn't feel I got any deal and had expected more.
Reviews.Author: jrleonardfl
